data.actual_result: The poop and the button aren't aligned.
data.expected_result: The poop and the button are aligned.
data.short_description: The sad poop and the cancel button aren't aligned in the invalid invite screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the add a server button in the bottom of your server list and click on join server with invite link. - Type in nonsense stuff in the text field. - Click on join. - Switch to landscape mode in the invalid invite screen.
